inclusion.criterion: postoperative head and neck oncologic surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 2 and 3 American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to swallow tablets whole (not chewed, broken or crushed) in the immediate postoperative period after recovery of cognitive functions.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: allergic to oxycodone and other opioids
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients who are receiving opioid analgesics in baseline
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of sickle cell disease and has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He also had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
